ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “I wan' learn how speak beddah.”{PAUSE}“But don' wan' have stars fall down.
You think…same?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “You want drink?
Iz OK. You take time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // “It's weird seeing Meteor's reflection
on the sea in the evening!”{PAUSE}“It gives you the creeps.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // “I traveled around a long time…”{PAUSE}“And this town has the most beautiful
ocean I've ever seen.”{PAUSE}“Sometimes you can't recognize things
when they're right in front of you.”{PAUSE}“I guess I took it for granted
because it's so close, and
I was so used to seeing it all the time.”{PAUSE}“That's why
I came back here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “We're all headin' over to Gold Saucer now.”{PAUSE}“We're gonna make a ton of money
at the Chocobo races.”{PAUSE}“Then we're gonna take a trip
to Icicle Inn and snowboard.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:12}); // “I don't care whether Meteor comes or not,
I'm not giving up yet!”{PAUSE}“I still haven't surfed
the best waves of Costa del Sol!”{PAUSE}“I hope the Meteor doesn't strike before I do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:10}); // “We look like great surfers…”{PAUSE}“But the only clothes we have
are these swim trunks.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // “Yeah,
snowboarding's what's happening this year.”{PAUSE}“I'm sick of surfing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Mukki
“I just want to sit here with my drink.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Mukki
“I really like this town.”{PAUSE}“You could walk around here naked,
and no one'd look twice.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // “My boss is a total arrogant ass!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna tell him off!
I'm gonna scream my head off!”{PAUSE}“Isn't that what life's all about?
What do you think?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // “…HIC…
Mm? Wanna order?
We're outta that now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:17}); // “…huff…wheeze…”{PAUSE}“Heat and cold are
just memories of the Planet…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // “…huff…puff…
I can't stand hot places…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “Come on…please. If you don't buy from me…
I can't pay the rent.
No one else will either.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “Come on…please. If you don't buy from me…
I won't be able to pay the rent.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // “Welcome to Bar del Sol!
Here's to tropical nights!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “While you're here, forget all
those awful things
going on outside, and
just enjoy yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “Hey! I thought you'd drop by.”{PAUSE}“(That's 1, 2…4 fishes
all together…not bad.)”

dialogStrings: Bar

“You want drink?
Iz OK. You take time.”

Mukki
“I really like this town.”{PAUSE}“You could walk around here naked,
and no one'd look twice.”

“…huff…puff…
I can't stand hot places…”

“…HIC…
Mm? Wanna order?
We're outta that now.”

“Hey! I thought you'd drop by.”{PAUSE}“(That's 1, 2…4 fishes
all together…not bad.)”

“Come on…please. If you don't buy from me…
I won't be able to pay the rent.”

“Yeah,
snowboarding's what's happening this year.”{PAUSE}“I'm sick of surfing.”

“We're all headin' over to Gold Saucer now.”{PAUSE}“We're gonna make a ton of money
at the Chocobo races.”{PAUSE}“Then we're gonna take a trip
to Icicle Inn and snowboard.”

“Welcome to Bar del Sol!
Here's to tropical nights!”

“We look like great surfers…”{PAUSE}“But the only clothes we have
are these swim trunks.”

“I traveled around a long time…”{PAUSE}“And this town has the most beautiful
ocean I've ever seen.”{PAUSE}“Sometimes you can't recognize things
when they're right in front of you.”{PAUSE}“I guess I took it for granted
because it's so close, and
I was so used to seeing it all the time.”{PAUSE}“That's why
I came back here.”

“I don't care whether Meteor comes or not,
I'm not giving up yet!”{PAUSE}“I still haven't surfed
the best waves of Costa del Sol!”{PAUSE}“I hope the Meteor doesn't strike before I do.”

“It's weird seeing Meteor's reflection
on the sea in the evening!”{PAUSE}“It gives you the creeps.”

“I wan' learn how speak beddah.”{PAUSE}“But don' wan' have stars fall down.
You think…same?”

Mukki
“I just want to sit here with my drink.”

“My boss is a total arrogant ass!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna tell him off!
I'm gonna scream my head off!”{PAUSE}“Isn't that what life's all about?
What do you think?”

“…huff…wheeze…”{PAUSE}“Heat and cold are
just memories of the Planet…”

“Come on…please. If you don't buy from me…
I can't pay the rent.
No one else will either.”

“While you're here, forget all
those awful things
going on outside, and
just enjoy yourself.”
